# TCDirectionPad

**Class**

An object that represents a direction pad.

## Declaration

```swift
class TCDirectionPad
```

## Overview

You can configure this object to behave as either a composite direction pad (mirrored by a `GCControllerDirectionPad` on the associated `GCController` instance) or as four separate buttons.

## Inspecting the direction pad

- **compositeLabel**: A composite control label.
- **downContents**: The contents for the down button.
- **downLabel**: The label for the down button, if the control isn’t a composite direction pad.
- **highlightDuration**: The time it takes for a highlight to fade away, in seconds.
- **inputIsMutuallyExclusive**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control has mutally exclusive input.
- **isDigital**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control behaves as a digital button.
- **isRadial**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control behaves as a swipeable radial button.
- **leftContents**: The contents for the left button.
- **leftLabel**: The label for the left button, if the control isn’t a composite direction pad.
- **rightContents**: The contents for the right button.
- **rightLabel**: The label for the right button, if the control isn’t a composite direction pad.
- **upContents**: The contents for the up button.
- **upLabel**: The label for the up button, if the control isn’t a composite direction pad.

## Getting the collider shape

- **colliderShape**: The collider shape for the direction pad.
- **TCColliderShape**: Defines the shape of a control collider.

## Controls

- **TCControl**: A protocol that defines the base properties and methods for all touch controls.
- **TCButton**: A control that represents a single on-screen button.
- **TCSwitch**: A control that represents a single on-screen switch.
- **TCThumbstick**: Represents a single on-screen thumbstick.
- **TCThrottle**: Represents a single on-screen throttle - a one axis input.
- **TCTouchpad**: Represents a single on-screen touchpad that reports absolute coordinates or delta movements.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

- CustomDebugStringConvertible
